aboutText: I'm a Fullstack software developer with experience and preference for Javascript and Typescript, and expertise in frameworks like NextJs, Express, NodeJs and Many Others. I'm a quick learner and use to collaborate closely with clients to create the solution they need,so if you're interested in working with me you can contact me, otherwise if you are interested in me or want to know a little bit more about me click the arrow at the beggining of this section

experiences.title: Internship / Analist
points: Projects automation with IBM BPM Tool.
Made efficient changes to existing financial flows of data.
Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.

experiences.title: Full stack Developer
points: Developed desktop and web apps with Java (mainly using Springboot and Oracle as Database) and ReacJs for it's FrontEnd.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality products.
Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
Restructured core applications made with older version of Java.

experiences.title: Front End Developer
points: Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and other related technologies.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality products.
Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.
